duties_responsibilities.duty: Launch products and execute the entire product development lifecycle using agile methodologies.
Manage long-term roadmaps for more than one product, involving sales, marketing, implementations, clients, prospects, partners, and other groups.
Work collaboratively with the agile team, internal stakeholders (engineering, operations, support), and end users to drive effective execution and strategy.
Utilize user metrics and instrumentation to identify opportunities to unblock product growth and adoption.
Drive projects from idea to launch to outcomes, with a predictable cadence and involving multiple stakeholders from diverse disciplines.
Navigate a fast-paced, rapidly changing work environment.
Meet the requirements for a high-quality virtual work environment, including the ability to work from a quiet space with minimal interruptions or distractions, and a strong internet connection.
Be open to periodic travel for work.
Apply a high level of judgment, analytical ability, and creativity in investigating problems that require original and innovative solutions.

education_certification.credential: BA/BS in Business, Engineering, or other relevant field of study or equivalent experience.
